Author: OkWorking7
Text: I can’t tell if you actually forget to eat or just say you forget and purposely aren’t eating.  Like the other commenter said, the solution is to just eat. Having a banana or a cheese and salad sandwich 1 hour before practice won’t cause you magically gain weight. Just fuel yourself enough for the practice. Also Jesus please drink water regularly!

Author: amehlea
Text: Just eat a bit so that you can get through practice. Look at it this way, do you want to function normally and get through practice and not rise any suspicion or do you want to not eat, possibly pass out and get everyone on your ass?  That being said, please eat something. Lol, comes from me who is going to do a two day fast :) let me be a hypocrite, cuz i care about others but not about myself okay bye  take care hon <3
